ingredientsDesc:
型號：30442  VIDAS D-Dimer Exclusion

60 DD2 Strips：1: sample wells; 2-4: empty wells; 5: Conjugate：alkaline phosphatase labeled anti-FbDP monoclonal immunoglobulins (mouse) in TRIS buffer (0.05 mol/l pH 6.5) + horse serum + 0.9 g/l sodijm azide (400μl); 6, 7, 9: Wash buffer：TRIS buffer (0.01 mol/l, pH 7.3) + chemical stablizers + 0.9 g/l sodium azide (600μl); 8: Diluent：TRIS buffer (0.05 mol/l, pH 7.4) + calf serum + protein and chemical stabilizers + 0.9 g/l sodium azide (600μl); 10: Cuvette with substrate：
4 Methyl-umbelliferyl-phosphate (0.6 mmol/l) + diethanolamine (DEA) (0.62 mol/l or 6.6%, pH 9.2) + 1 g/l sodium azide (300μl)
60DD2 SPRs 2x30：
Interior of SPRs coated with anti-FbDP monoclonal immunoglobulins (mouse).
DD2 Controls：
C1 control：FbDP obtained from human plasma diluted in glycine-albumin bovine buffer.
C2 control：FbDP obtained from human plasma diluted in glycine-albumin bovine buffer.
DD2 Calibrators：
S1 calibrator：FbDP obtained from human plasma diluted in glycine-albumin bovine buf
applicantName: 香港商生物梅里埃有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 臺北市信義區松山路130號8樓
efficacy: 利用ELFA技術(免疫螢光分析)，定量測定人血漿(檸檬酸鈉)中纖維蛋白降解產物(FbDP)的含量。
